title: AI Engineer
summary: Hi, I’m Muhammad Tahoor Bin Rauf, a passionate Machine Learning Engineer with hands-on experience in model development, deep learning, and AI engineering. I’ve worked on a variety of projects, from AI-powered teaching assistants to GAN-based image generation and NLP-driven insights, honing my skills in LLMs, computer vision, and autonomous agents.
focus: I thrive on building intelligent systems that combine creativity and technology, turning complex problems into actionable solutions. Currently, I’m exploring Generative AI and AI agents, pushing the boundaries of what AI can achieve in real-world applications.
hobbies: When I’m not coding or training models, I enjoy researching emerging AI technologies, participating in hackathons, and continuously expanding my skill set. My goal is to contribute to innovative AI solutions that have a tangible impact on people’s lives.
